Klasse ThemeDTO

java.lang.Object
quizlogic.DataTransportObject
quizlogic.dto.ThemeDTO
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Serializable
public class ThemeDTO extends DataTransportObject
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a quiz theme (category).

Each theme contains:

  • A title
  • An optional description
  • A list of associated quiz questions
This class extends DataTransportObject for consistent ID and validation handling.

Themes can be persisted, edited, and displayed in the quiz application.

Seit:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Autor:
Christos Poulios

      Creates a concise string summary of the theme.
      Angegeben von:
      getContentString in Klasse DataTransportObject
      Gibt zurück:
      formatted string showing title and number of questions

    • validate

      protected void validate()
      Validates theme data.
      • Theme title must not be null or empty
      • Theme title length must not exceed 100 characters
      • Theme description, if present, must not exceed 500 characters
      Angegeben von:
      validate in Klasse DataTransportObject
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if validation fails
